description.value:
Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

As the leaves fall, the underbrush grows. You or one of your companions can attempt to [[/act sneak]]{Sneak (Stealth)} / [[/act sneak statistic=recitation]]{Sneak (Recitation)} or [[/act feint]]{Feint (Deception)} / [[/act feint statistic=recitation]]{Feint (Recitation)}. While remaining within 20 feet of each other, magical leaves swirl around you and grant @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealment} to the one attempting the check until the end of your turn.
